title: [HOLD for payment 2024-10-29] [$250] Sign in-User remains in first step of Onboarding when tapping an option after closing the app
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Open the New Expensify app
2. Log in with new gmail account
3. Close the app and reopen
4. Tap on any option in onboarding modal

Expected result: The next step of onboarding flow should be displayed.

Actual result: None

Open the New Expensify app 2. Log in with new gmail account 3. Close the app and reopen 4.
